Sean Sperte

My name is Sean Sperte (pronounced “spur-tee”). For almost 12 years I worked for The City Church in Seattle in the Communications and Media departments. I also co-founded Sky Balloon Studio, a software design company that creates iOS apps. More recently I co-founded Tagboard, a startup in Redmond, WA.

I’m 33 years-old, married to Casey, and have a three children: a girl and two boys. I live in Kirkland, Washington, on Seattle’s Eastside. I’ve been blogging (here) since 2005, and creating websites for almost 20 years.
